cards.title: Patina
powers: Up to 3 hero targets regain 1 HP each. a player may draw 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One hero may use a power now.

openingLines.default: if you don't back down, you're going to be all washed up!
openingLines.GrandWarlordVossCharacter: we're just going to have to sink that fleet then.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: your ‘justice’ is misplaced, mister mean legacy.
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: how are you with, uh, waterfowl?
openingLines.FrictionTeamCharacter: don't need speed. the ocean is inevitable.
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: rewritten how? ok, that's just very unhelpful.
openingLines.Cauldron.MenagerieCharacter: well ok. hey wait a second! that's a hero!

cards.title: Applications in Fluidics
body: whenever a water card is destroyed, do one of the following:
{ 1 target regains 1 HP.{BR}{ 1 player draws 1 card.{BR}{ [i]Patina[/i] deals 1 target 1 cold or melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: we're...{BR}at the bottom of the sea.

cards.title: Fish Out of Water
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 water cards. Put them into your hand. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your deck.
Play 1 water card.
cards.flavorText: “I never quite fit in.{BR}now there's no hiding it.”

cards.title: Healing Spritz
body: increase HP recovery caused by your cards and Powers by 1.
powers: 1 target regains 1 HP. The next time that target is dealt damage, they regain 2 HP.

cards.title: Hybrid Survivor
body: {Patina} deals 1 target 1 melee damage, then deals 1 target 1 cold damage.
{Patina} regains 1 HP.
draw a card or play a card.
cards.flavorText: “Every time I squash one,{BR}another crops up!”

cards.title: Impermeable
body: Reduce cold, energy, fire, and radiant damage dealt to hero targets by the number of water cards in play.
When {Patina} would be dealt damage of a type reduced by this card, you may destroy this card. If you do, you may redirect that Damage to a Target of your choice.
cards.flavorText: “oh hey wow, that's{BR}[b]a lot[/b] of water.”

cards.title: Lab Assist
body: Whenever a hero uses a Power on an equipment card, you may increase by 1 or reduce by 1 one of the numerals in the text of that Power.
powers: 1 player may discard 2 cards. Any who do may use 1 power.

cards.title: Lab Coat
body: Whenever you play an equipment card from your hand, you may draw a card.
powers: You may move 1 equipment card from your trash into play. If no cards enter play this way, 1 hero other than {Patina} may draw 1 card now.

cards.title: Maerynian Immunity
body: After {Patina} deals Damage, she becomes immune to that type of Damage. After {Patina} deals a different type of Damage, her Damage immunity changes to that type.
Whenever a hero target would be dealt damage {Patina} is immune to, you may redirect it to {Patina}. If you do, destroy a water card or this card.

cards.title: Spray Back
body: When a villain target deals damage to a hero target, you may destroy this card. If you do, {Patina} deals the source of that damage X projectile damage, where X = the number of water cards in play plus 1.
cards.flavorText: “ey, cheri?{BR}ah did not see you zer.”
cards.flavorReference: Cajun Gator, Fish Out of Water (EC #13)

cards.title: Surge Wave
body: {Patina} deals each target X cold or melee damage, where X = the number of water cards in play plus 1.
Destroy an environment card.
cards.flavorText: “oh, I am glad I'm not{BR}[b]down there[/b] right now!”

cards.title: Tempestuous Toss
body: Discard the top card of each deck.
Each player may discard a card. Those who do may draw a card.
You may destroy a hero ongoing or equipment card. If you do, {Patina} deals up to X targets 3 projectile damage each, where X = the number of water cards in play plus 1.
cards.flavorText: “no! this ain't how{BR}it's s'posed to go!”

cards.title: Undertow
body: Destroy an ongoing or equipment card.
If it was a hero card, {Patina} deals 1 target 1 cold damage and X psychic damage in either order, where X = the number of water cards in play plus 1.

cards.title: Water Punch
body: {Patina} deals 1 target 1 melee damage and 1 cold damage, in either order.
A Non-Character Target dealt damage this way loses any End of Turn effects on its card until the start of {Patina}'s next turn.
cards.flavorText: “I think I at least{BR}trapped that one. ish.”

cards.title: Whip Splash
body: Whenever a villain card would be played, you may discard a card. If you do, remove this card from the game instead.
powers: {Patina} deals 1 target X cold or melee damage, where X = the number of water cards in play plus 1.
cards.flavorText: “More of that, if ye please.{BR}cannae hypnotize without{BR}that amulet!”

promoCards.title: Patina
powers: Discard up to 3 water cards. For each card discarded this way, draw 1 card or play 1 non-water card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Up to two hero equipment cards may be played now.
Each hero target with an equipment card in their play area regains 1 HP.

openingLines.GrandWarlordVossCharacter: why can't aliens show up for discovery? it's always conquer conquer conquer.
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: ‘never’ is such a limiting word. let's test that hypothesis, shall we?
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: ‘corvus’? but that one there is [i]cathartidae[/i]. oh, do you find this cathartic?
openingLines.FrictionTeamCharacter: I doubt you can either. Physics just isn't on your side.
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: this is a remnant of the multiverse theory, yes? fascinating.
openingLines.Cauldron.MenagerieCharacter: my scientific curiosity forbids me from saying no.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: the science does not support an event like this. very strange.

promoCards.title: Verdigris
powers: [i]Verdigris[/i] deals a target 2 melee damage and 2 cold damage, in either order. That target deals [i]Verdigris[/i] 3 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero target deals 1 target 1 melee damage. A different hero target deals 1 target 1 cold damage.
Each hero character may deal themselves 3 cold damage to use a power now.

openingLines.default: the ocean floor is too good for you.
openingLines.GrandWarlordVossCharacter: oh good, I needed some punching bags.
openingLines.TheMatriarchCharacter: you've gone and put me in a foul mood.
openingLines.FrictionTeamCharacter: just... stand still... for a moment and we'll see!
openingLines.MissInformationTeamCharacter: yeah. kinda used to that at this point.
openingLines.Cauldron.MenagerieCharacter: just don't try to catch me. you'll have your hands full.
